title: Gainful Employment Disclosure  |  DePaul University | DePaul University, Chicago
content: Gainful Employment Disclosure Apply Online Request Info Visit Campus DePaul University>Gainful Employment Disclosure Gainful Employment Certificate Programs ​​Information about the programs are found on the webpages for each of the programs. For tuition cost information, please visit theStudent Accountspages. Graduate Certificate programs are limited to Federal and Private Loans; to further discuss financial aid, please contact OneDePaul. The following certificate programs are approved for financial aid. College of Education, Graduate Non-Degree Programs School of Music, Graduate Non-Degree Certificate Programs College of Communication, Graduate Non-Degree Certificate Programs College of Health Sciences, Post Masters Certificates
